title: The Girls Next Door-Season 2-Tv Rips
description:
Season 2, Episode 1: Here&#039;s Looking at You, Hef
Original Air Date: 30 July 2006
Celebrating the "best weekend ever," Hef and the girls watch Casablanca. As Hef&#039;s eightieth birthday approaches, the staff of the mansion prepares for a blow-out party and the girls search for the perfect birthday present.

Season 2, Episode 2: 80 Is the New 40
Original Air Date: 6 August 2006


Season 2, Episode 3: Career Dazed
Original Air Date: 6 August 2006
With their fame from the TV show and their Playboy pictorial, the girls now have new opportunities. Holly designs a line of The Girls Next Door jewelry, Bridget hosts Playboy TV&#039;s The Weekend Flash, and Kendra gets a flashy grill for her teeth.

Season 2, Episode 4: Mutiny on the Booty
Original Air Date: 13 August 2006
With the success of their first Playboy pictorial, Hef decides to do a second photo shoot with the girls. He wants to have them pose on the round bed, but the girls lobby to focus on their individual personalities.

Season 2, Episode 5: San Diego or Busts
Original Air Date: 20 August 2006
Hef uses his private train car to take Kendra for a visit back to her hometown of San Diego. With Bridget and Holly in tow, Hef and Kendra catch-up with her family and sight-see in the area.

Season 2, Episode 6: Heavy Petting
Original Air Date: 2 September 2006
Bridget hosts a birthday party for her dog; the Mansion holds its only family-oriented party of the year for Easter.

Season 2, Episode 7: Sleepwear Optional
Original Air Date: 9 September 2006
Hef names Kara Monaco as the 2006 Playboy Playmate of the Year, and the girls celebrate her success with a slumber party. The girls get crazy with some skinny-dipping and later they toilet paper the neighbor&#039;s house.

Season 2, Episode 8: I See London, I See France
Original Air Date: 17 September 2006
To celebrate Hef&#039;s 80th birthday, Holly, Bridget, and Kendra travel with him to Europe, starting in London and Paris.

Season 2, Episode 9: When in Rome
Original Air Date: 24 September 2006
Holly, Bridget, Kendra, and Hef continue their tour of Europe, visiting Cannes, Barcelona, Munich, Rome, Naples, and Venice.

Season 2, Episode 10: Baby Talk
Original Air Date: 1 October 2006
The girls host a baby shower for former Playboy Playmate, Victoria Fuller, and Holly expresses her wish to be a mom. Bridget&#039;s cat, Gizmo, gets a house call from a veterinary dentist, and Kendra gets rid of prank callers at the mansion.

Season 2, Episode 11: The 21 Club
Original Air Date: 8 October 2006
The girls and some close friends travel to Las Vegas to celebrate Kendra&#039;s 21st birthday. In true VIP fashion, they stay in luxury suite in the Palms, and Kendra finally gets an opportunity to show off her blinged-out grill.

Season 2, Episode 12: Girls Will Be Ghouls
Original Air Date: 15 October 2006


Season 2, Episode 13: The Age of Aquarium
Original Air Date: 29 October 2006
The girls make a guest appearance on the "Loveline" radio show with Dr. Drew. Next, the 5-year anniversary of Holly and Hef&#039;s relationship is approaching. Holly buys some new colorful tropical fish for the fish tank near the aviary, and Hef and Holly celebrate the anniversary by having a fondue dinner with Bridget, Kendra, and some friends. In other events, Bridget&#039;s aunt Jane visits to help Holly understand the behavior of Koko the spider monkey, and Kendra faces repercussions from a blog post she wrote about problems on the set of an Eminem music video.

Season 2, Episode 14: Rabbit Season
Original Air Date: 5 November 2006


Season 2, Episode 15: We Can Work It Out
Original Air Date: 12 November 2006
Holly, Bridget, and Kendra film an exercise video.

Season 2, Episode 16: Playboys After Dark
Original Air Date: 19 November 2006

Please Help Seed & Enjoy -Pro-
